code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Logout=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogout=async()=>{try{const res=await fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/auth/logout',{method:'POST',credentials:'include'});const data=await res.json();navigate('/login');}catch(err){console.error(err);alert('Logout failed');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-center items-center my-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,className:"bg-red-500 text-white px-6 py-2 rounded hover:bg-red-600",children:"Logout"})});};export default Logout;
